page.title: 16Scotter County School
page.content: The school (built by{Lindsey C.C.}) was opened in{1932}as an all age school.It had 150 pupils and 8 staff. In 1958 it became a Primary school with 175 pupils.At present there are{ {300}pupils on roll with 10 teachers (including the headmaster).There has been a drop of{about 100}pupils in the last 5 years,with a reduction of 4 staff.At the age of 11, pupils can transfer to{Huntcliff Comprehensive {School,Kirton Lindsey}or take the County Examination of Selection to the High School in Gainsborough.Delay in implementing a Comprehensive system in Gainsborough has caused much confusion and difficulty at Scotter. The school is also used by outside organisations in the evening.These are Parent/ Teacher Association,Brownies, Girl Guides and also as an Adult Education Centre.
